title: Anyone else think celerity is just dumb?
body:
8% movement speed to all bonus movespeed. Ok, so if I get 100 bonus movespeed, I would get 8 more with this rune? Does that even make a difference when you factor movespeed cap?

Honestly, unless you are {{champion:120}}  or {{champion:33}} , this rune is just dumb. And guess which tree its in, " Sorcery"

replies.body: I think you're ignoring the damage boost from it. As well, it's a rune. Runes aren't meant for late-game utility. That's what Keystones are for.
it doesnt have a dmg boost anymore, new celerity is just the eh ms boost that makes no difference on any champs really, its trash rn

Jeez, I'm missing out on updates then. Still, it's a rune. It's not meant for late-game utility. As well, having more movement speed than the opponents is a pretty great benefit. It means you can escape them. It means they can't escape you. It means you have a better chance of evading ganks than they have. It means you have a higher chance of evading skillshots than they have.

it works well that that in theory but in game its just a wasted slot, 8% extra isnt much because it only applies to speed boosts not flat ms, theres no real reason to take it over absolute focus or transcendence
No reason except every reason that having higher movement speed than your opponent matters...which are quite a many reasons.
its only on speed boosts and barely makes them better, if you get a speed boost its likely you already ARE now faster, it just doesnt need to exist and certainly not in the sorcery line

I think it doesn't do enough now. I'm not sure it's "just dumb." I think the idea has a lot of promise, but it's not delivering on that promise atm. I think it ought to do *something* other than "boring stat boos"t if it's ever going to be useful or fun on champs other than Rammus and Hecarim.
I would rather they made it 4% total ms with no ad conversion, since some champs legit used movespeed quints for 4.5% back then.

This.  4.5% movespeed runes were my shit when jungling Udyr, Maokai, etc.

Hell, doing two for a 3% movespeed buff in midlane when you were laning against a brand or some other skillshot based champ was a huge bonus for you (obviously back in the glorious season 3 days)

It honestly needs to be a flat move speed bonus and a bonus % multiplier.

Celerity: Gives +2 move speed per level. Bonus move speed is increased by 5%.
That sounds extremely OP.
